info.description: This is the API for your project.
info.title: Your Project API

get.description: Retrieves a list of all uploaded images, optionally filtered by folder.

post.description: Uploads a new image, checks for duplicates via hash.

delete.description: Deletes an image by its UUID.

get.description: Retrieves a list of available payment gateways for admin panel.
Get all store settings
Get current store balance

post.description: Logs in a user and returns a temporary token if 2FA is required
Logs out a user and invalidates their JWT token
Verifies the 2FA code and returns a JWT token
Manually adds a deposit transaction to a user's balance. Prefer using the /deposit/invoice flow.
Completes the bot admin login by verifying the temporary token and 2FA code, then linking the Telegram ID.
Initiates the login process for a bot admin, validates credentials, and returns a temporary auth token.

get.description: Checks if the bot is allowed to operate based on store balance
Generates a base64 encoded captcha image, its answer, and variants for selection.
Get a hierarchical list of all categories.

post.description: Create a new category with the given name and optional parent_id.

get.description: Get a single category by its ID.

put.description: Update a category's name and/or parent by its ID.

parameters.description: New Category Name and/or Parent ID
parameters.name: category

delete.description: Delete a category by its ID.

post.description: Creates a new payment invoice for a selected gateway and amount.

get.description: Retrieves a list of available payment gateways.
Serves an image file by its UUID.
Retrieves a single payment invoice by its ID.

patch.description: Sets the Telegram message ID for a given payment invoice.

parameters.description: Internal Order ID of the invoice
parameters.name: order_id

get.description: Retrieves details for the currently authenticated admin/seller user.

put.description: Updates the referral program settings for the current admin/seller.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all orders.

post.description: Creates an order and processes the purchase of a product from the user's balance.
Cancels an order and refunds the user.

get.description: Get a paginated and filtered list of all products.

post.description: Adds a new product to the store.

get.description: Retrieves details for a single product.

delete.description: Deletes a product by its ID.

patch.description: Updates parts of an existing product.

parameters.description: Product data (only include fields to be updated)
parameters.name: product

post.description: Adds a stock movement (e.g., initial stock, sale, return) for a product.

get.description: Get public store settings

post.description: Registers a new user from a Telegram bot or reactivates a deleted one.

parameters.description: User Telegram ID and Bot Name
parameters.name: user

get.description: Retrieves the current balance for a bot user.

put.description: Updates the captcha verification status for a bot user.

get.description: Retrieves the payment invoice history for a bot user.
Retrieves the order history for a bot user.
Retrieves a list of a bot user's active and expired subscriptions.

patch.description: Blocks or unblocks a bot user.
patch.summary: Toggle Block Status of a Bot User

get.description: Retrieves the transaction history for a bot user.

post.description: Handles incoming webhook notifications from a payment gateway.

hash.description: SHA256 hash of the file content

orderID.description: Our internal unique ID for the transaction

fulfillment_image_id.description: The image ID to be delivered

fulfillment_text.description: The text content to be delivered

responses.ErrorResponseSchema.description: This is the standard error response structure.
